data.title: Book Recommendations — Waldorf School of Palm Beach
data.text:
Book Recommendations for EC and Grades

We have collected our Waldorf inspired reading list that is age appropriate for each child.

Early Years from the age of 3-6

● Admar Kwant: Sam and the Gnome’s Red Hat

● Adrian Macho: The Whale the Sea and the Stairs

● Andrea Cheng: When the Bees Fly Home

● Daniela Drescher: Goodnight Sandman

● Daniela Drescher: Little Fairy Can’t Sleep

● Dawn Casey: Spin a Scarf of Sunshine

● Doris Rainville: The Girl Who Never Let Her Mother Brush Her Hair ● Doris Rainville:The Power of Love

● Dvzinka Hayda: Natalia's Journey to the Land of the Fairies

● Elsa Beskow: Around the Year

● Elsa Beskow: Around the Year

● Elsa Beskow: Children of the Forest

● Elsa Beskow: Emily and Daisy

● Else Wenz-Viëtor The Christmas Angels
